caption.center: Carroll OWENS v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.attorneys:
Carroll Owens, pro se.
Bill Allain, Atty. Gen. by Mark A. Chinn, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
